plot: Set in a world destroyed by chemical warfare and a declining population, a soldier brings his new love back to his Utopian home only to resort to desperate measures to stay together.
title: Loveproof
plot_es: Set in a world destroyed by chemical warfare and a declining population, a soldier brings his new love back to his Utopian home only to resort to desperate measures to stay together.
plot_en: Set in a world destroyed by chemical warfare and a declining population, a soldier brings his new love back to his Utopian home only to resort to desperate measures to stay together.
